reviewText: while it's great to finally have three of my favourite music videos in their entirety (fleetwood mac's "gypsy", kim karne's "bette davis eyes", and the buggle's "video killed the radio star"), NONE of the individual music videos on this dvd are in STEREO!!!!  the main program seems to be, but the bonus individual music videos are not... are the producers of this dvd expecting the viewers to listen to this in 5.1 MONO???? for serious????
